author: coar
msg: Make it even easier for sites to present uniform content by
making the server's signature text, which is added to server-
generated pages, available to all types of requests.  Then
scripts, SSI pages, and such can all use the same signature
as the server's generated pages if desired.

author: rse
msg: PORT: Fix sys/resource.h handling for SCO 3.x platform.
Submitted by: M. Laak <maert@proinv.ee>

author: coar
msg: Fix another potentially troublesome LWSP==SP assumption.

author: rse
msg: Fallback from sysconf-based to plain HZ-based `ticks per second'
calculation in mod_status for all systems which don't have POSIX
sysconf() (like UTS 2.1) and not only for the NEXT platform.
Submitted by: Dave Dykstra <dwd@bell-labs.com>
Reviewed by: Ralf S. Engelschall
